item.title: Video Editor for Youtube and Talking Head Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am in need of a skilled video editor who specializes in Youtube and talking head videos. The main goal is to enhance the production quality of my videos. The content revolves around spirituality and alchemy. If you have experience in these areas and are passionate about creating visually appealing and engaging videos, this job is for you. You will be responsible for editing, adding text and graphics, enhancing audio, and ensuring a smooth flow of the final video. Attention to detail and creativity are essential. Please provide examples of your previous work and any relevant certifications.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- YouTube video optimization
- Talking head videos
- Understanding of spirituality and alchemy
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

Hourly Range: $5.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States

item.title: Videographer and Video Editor for Storytelling Project - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer and video editor to help us create a dynamic video that mimics the dramatic style of a movie trailer, similar to the one linked below.  We are a stroller wagon company, and we’re excited to introduce our new line of stroller wagon accessories! Our upcoming video will showcase these accessories in action, featuring parents and kids enjoying the wagon by the beautiful Los Angeles port. We can’t wait to highlight how our products make family outings more fun and convenient. This project is intended for use on social media reels and YouTube.

https://youtu.be/fpPv8XdjW8w?si=2Ot99C03n0eqC9Ft

In this role, you will be responsible for capturing high-quality footage and crafting a compelling narrative through editing. We would like to mimic a movie trailer but have commercial aspects where the message is powerful and highlights key aspects of a story and concepts of how our stroller wagon is used, all while utilizing impactful music, voiceovers, and selective editing to evoke emotion and intrigue viewers.

Responsibilities:
Capture high-quality footage during the video shoot - this will be for social media and YouTube
Edit and enhance footage to craft a captivating story line, mimicking the dramatic flair of a movie trailer
Collaborate closely with our creative team to ensure the video aligns with our vision

Requirements:
Demonstrated experience in videography and video editing
Proficiency with video editing software
Ability to interpret and execute creative briefs effectively
Strong attention to detail and excellent time management skills
If you are passionate about storytelling through video and have the skills we're looking for, we'd love to see examples of your previous work in your portfolio. We look forward to hearing from you soon.

Budget: $200
Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:07 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Marketing Podcast - Upwork
item.description:
About Me:

I host a leading podcast in the marketing industry, focusing on media mix optimization and paid marketing. My podcast features interviews with top marketing experts, providing valuable insights for marketers at high-growth startups, founders, and anyone managing a paid marketing budget. I am looking for a talented Video Editor to join my team and help elevate the podcast's visual content.

Job Description:

I am seeking a creative and detail-oriented Video Editor to assist with the production and editing of video content for my business podcast. The ideal candidate will have experience in editing long-form podcast episodes and creating engaging micro-content for distribution across multiple platforms.

Responsibilities:

Podcast Episode Editing:

Edit full-length podcast episodes to ensure high-quality audio and video.
Sync audio and video tracks, adjust sound levels, and remove any background noise or distractions.
Add intros, outros, and any necessary transitions or graphics.

Micro-Content Creation:

Create short, engaging video segments from podcast episodes for YouTube and other social media platforms.
Add captions, subtitles, and graphics to enhance viewer engagement.
Optimize video content for various platforms, ensuring the best possible quality and format.

Collaboration:

Work closely with me and the Podcast Content Marketing Manager to understand content requirements and ensure consistency with the overall brand and messaging.
Receive and implement feedback to continuously improve video content quality.

Content Management:

Organize and manage video files to ensure easy access and retrieval.
Maintain an archive of edited episodes and micro-content for future use.

Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing, particularly for podcasts or similar media.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
Strong understanding of audio editing and enhancement techniques.
Ability to create engaging video content tailored to various social media platforms.
Excellent attention to detail and a creative eye for visual storytelling.
Strong communication skills and ability to work independently.
Passion for marketing and staying updated with industry trends.

To Apply:

Please submit some examples of previous video podcasts you've worked on. My preference is to work with someone who has experience in business and marketing content.

Hourly Range: $50.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:05 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Sales Letter (VSL) Editor for Ecommerce Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Video Sales Letter (VSL) Editor to join our ecommerce brand.

As our VSL Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing our VSLs to optimize conversion rates and engage our target audience.

This is an example of what we need: like this: https://www.facebook.com/ads/library/?id=1504341397177927

We will provide the copy, you will need to put the voice over, text and edit the video itself.

You will work closely with our marketing team to understand the brand's messaging and objectives, and then edit VSLs accordingly.

The ideal candidate should have a strong background in video editing, storytelling, and copywriting.

Attention to detail, creativity, and the ability to meet deadlines are also essential for this role.


Skills required:
- Video editing
- Attention to details
- Creativity
- Time management
- Adaptability
- High English level

Please include in your application the price you would ask for a video like the one on the link.

Better if you can do a "per minute rate"

Make sure to  send us some past work in the health niche you did in the past and use the word vsl all caps lock both the beginning of the title and the text of your application.

This is a long term project


Posted On: June 19, 2024 22:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Commercial, Video Post-Editing
Country: Italy
click to apply

item.title: Editor de videos para Youtube - Upwork
item.description:
¡Hola a todos! Estoy buscando un editor nivel intermedio para videos tipo noticias relevantes en Latinoamérica más que todo en Perú. Es un canal en pleno crecimiento.

El trabajo consiste en:

- Yo te envío el audio de la narración y el guión para que tu realices la edición.
- Es CRÍTICO que sepas cómo mantener la retención de la audiencia. (Ganchos en los primero 4 minutos)
- Se espera que usted revise el guión y haga coincidir los clips con lo que se explica (debe estar libre de derechos de autor).
- Por el momento la duración de los videos sería de 10 minutos.

Se necesitaría un editor que realice 1 a 2 videos por semana.

Al ser un proyecto en crecimiento se está pagando 0,8$ por minuto.

Dejo algunas referencias para que vea el tipo de edición que se necesita:
https://youtu.be/6TGqvuPLOdk
https://youtu.be/8iN6fV4Q1BQ
https://youtu.be/Y9ajuB6Nbe0

¿A quién buscamos exactamente?
Alguien familiarizado con Premier pro.
Alguien con un toque constante en el contenido.
Alguien que sepa enganchar al público con videos del nicho de noticias.
Alguien con un portafolio de videos para ver su nivel de experiencia. (MUY IMPORTANTE)
Alguien responsable con la entrega del video.

Budget: $7
Posted On: June 19, 2024 21:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Compositing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Audio Editing, Compositing, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: Peru
click to apply

item.title: Social Media Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
SOCIAL MEDIA VIDEO EDITOR

Sara Connell is a 5X bestselling author and the founder of Thought Leader Academy where she helps coaches, experts and entrepreneurs become bestselling authors, in demand speakers and monetize their mission through thought leadership.

The SCC team is looking for a talented, efficient, strategic video editor to work closely with us as an independent contractor to grow engagement, impact and sales through social media.


Ideal candidate will:

Be skilled in knowledge and content creation based on  what gets attention and trends relevant to our audience of women entrepreneurs and experts 25-60 years old.

Know both trending and classic marketing techniques to get engagement and grow audiences across multiple online media platforms.

Skilled and efficient at creating videos for social including reels, stories, carousels, shorts and long form.

Be masterful at creating compelling and high converting with strong hooks, titles, thumbnails, hashtags, shot cuts, b- roll, graphics, music, calls to action and all things that create engagement online.

Process: you’ll take long form and other video content recorded by CEO and make multiple shorts and edited long form for Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Tik Tok and possibly other platforms.

You’d also create sizzle reels of media and speaking engagements for website and marketing.

To apply, please include a portfolio link where you have created engagement through video on multiple social platforms, resume/CV of your marketing and editing experience and a brief paragraph of why you are interested in working with us. Please include the word “success” in the subject line of your email.

Position would start with a practice project then grow from 5 hours a week with the option to increase hours.

Must be a high vibe, positive, motivated and responsible person with a genuine desire to serve and inspire people. Also high level of English fluency, available during regular 9-5ET business hours USA.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 19, 2024 21:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Instagram Reels, Footage-Based Video, Instagram Story, Video Sales Letter, YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Instagram Reels, Footage-Based Video, Instagram Story, Video Sales Letter, YouTube Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative YouTube Content Creator for Music Trivia Shorts - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a highly creative and detail-oriented YouTube Content Creator to produce engaging music trivia shorts for our channel. The content will include a variety of music trivia formats such as "Finish the Lyrics," "Guess the Song," "One Word Challenges," and "Multiple Choice" quizzes covering all types of music genres

Requirements:
Proven experience in video production, especially with YouTube content.
Strong attention to detail and a passion for music.
Excellent understanding of music trivia and trends across various genres.
Preferably a fan of Taylor Swift (Swiftie), as some content will specifically cater to this fan base.
Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines.
Portfolio of past work, specifically with music-related content, must be provide

Responsibilities:
Create and edit short, engaging YouTube music trivia videos.
Develop content ideas and scripts that are entertaining and informative.
Ensure high-quality video production that aligns with the channel’s branding and audience expectations.

item.ns0:encoded:
Looking for a highly creative and detail-oriented YouTube Content Creator to produce engaging music trivia shorts for our channel. The content will include a variety of music trivia formats such as "Finish the Lyrics," "Guess the Song," "One Word Challenges," and "Multiple Choice" quizzes covering all types of music genres

Requirements:
Proven experience in video production, especially with YouTube content.
Strong attention to detail and a passion for music.
Excellent understanding of music trivia and trends across various genres.
Preferably a fan of Taylor Swift (Swiftie), as some content will specifically cater to this fan base.
Ability to work independently and meet tight deadlines.
Portfolio of past work, specifically with music-related content, must be provide

Responsibilities:
Create and edit short, engaging YouTube music trivia videos.
Develop content ideas and scripts that are entertaining and informative.
Ensure high-quality video production that aligns with the channel’s branding and audience expectations.
